      • fetch

        protected void fetch(RiverContext riverContext)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from class: SimpleRiverFlow
        After river context and state setup, when data should be fetched from river source, this method is called. The default is to invoke the fetch() method of the river source.
        Overrides:
